overview: SEDATED is an experimental rave film by Ampersand duo, Russia. The film consists of documentary and feature shots, insta videos, and CG. A club night is retrospected through a three-channel video installation. A young couple agrees to film each other during the party. There is the only rule—persistent following without distracting the present. Characters are surrounded by horrors in the night and the following morning turns into post-apocalypse.
title: Sedated
